title: Effective TypeScript: 62 Specific Ways to Improve Your TypeScript
description: TypeScript is a typed superset of JavaScript with the potential to solve many of the headaches for which JavaScript is famous. But TypeScript has its own complexities and pitfalls, and this book helps you navigate them.
notes: Great reference for TypeScript best practices

title: Architecture Patterns with Python
description: Learn how to build maintainable Python applications with TDD, DDD, and event-driven architecture.

title: The Lord of the Rings
description: A hobbit embarks on an epic quest to destroy a powerful ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron. This tale of friendship, courage, and sacrifice has become one of the most beloved fantasy epics of all time.
notes: Classic fantasy trilogy in one volume

title: Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep?
description: In a post-apocalyptic future, bounty hunter Rick Deckard is tasked with hunting down and 'retiring' six escaped Nexus-6 androids on Earth. As he pursues them, he begins to question what makes someone human in this dystopian world.

title: Where the Crawdads Sing
description: For years, rumors of the 'Marsh Girl' have haunted Barkley Cove, a quiet town on the North Carolina coast. When handsome Chase Andrews is found dead, locals immediately suspect Kya Clark. A story of coming-of-age, murder mystery, and nature's beauty.
notes: #1 New York Times Bestseller, Reese's Book Club Pick
